TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生時的新區域公開虛擬模式和決定需要新的項目範圍。The event occurs when a new area of a in virtual mode is exposed and the determines a new range of items is needed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#465)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#465)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 startIndex, int32 endIndex) cil managed
Public Sub New (startIndex As Integer, endIndex As Integer)

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 項目範圍的起始索引，這些項目是發生下一個 事件的 所需要。

span.span: The starting index of a range of items needed by the for the next event that occurs.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: 項目範圍的結束索引，這些項目是發生下一個 事件的 所需要。

span.span: The ending index of a range of items needed by the for the next event that occurs.

summary.span: 使用指定的起始和結束索引，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified starting and ending indices.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndIndex As Integer
public: property int EndIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得虛擬模式中 控制項所需要之值範圍的結束索引。

span.span: Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a control in virtual mode.

value.span: 索引，其位於 控制項所需要之值範圍的結尾。

span.span: The index at the end of the range of values needed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的值範圍和屬性表示的值最有可能需要的虛擬機器範圍的下一個相符項目控制項事件。The range of values specified by the and properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual control for the next occurrence of a event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#465)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#465](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#465)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StartIndex As Integer
public: property int StartIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得虛擬模式中 控制項所需要之值範圍的起始索引。

span.span: Gets the starting index for a range of values needed by a control in virtual mode.

value.span: 索引，其位於 控制項所需要之值範圍的開頭。

span.span: The index at the start of the range of values needed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所指定的值範圍和屬性表示的值最有可能需要的虛擬機器範圍的下一個相符項目控制項事件。The range of values specified by the and properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual control for the next occurrence of a event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
